title: Hi I'm Americano xp
body:
Methinks my country is le best b/c le militario y el fatman y little boy huehuehue

meanwhile national debt.

meanwhile illiterate and badly educated compared to the superiority that is Japan

media is bad quality, cartoons are bad, American songs are all badly computer generated pop, and even the games are bad (hence league NA sucks)

meanwhile Japan atm has higher life expectancy despite radiation (ironic huh)
